growth_medium: Cells were grown in natural sea water collected in Adriatic Sea. Twice per week 50ml of the algae Dunaliella tertiolecta grown in Walne's medium (http://www.ccap.ac.uk/media/recipes/Walnes.htm) were added to each one-liter cell cultures
